channel.title: Matrix 718/742 Help
channel.description:
Hello, I'm pretty new to this build, I usually do 317's. I've recently changed my cache from my matrix source to 742, and changed the NPC, Object, and Item Definition files within the source, but when playing, a lot of the npc's are glitched, such as nex, as seen here http://puu.sh/2camU and here http://puu.sh/2casM
I was wondering if anyone here would be able to help me at all? Thank you very much. I don't know if it's server sided, or if it's client, but thank you all for your help..

item.title: Matrix 718/742 Help
item.dc:creator: @Potzon Potzon
item.description:
@Potzon wrote:

RuneScape have updated (almost) all the animations for the God Wars bosses, you can find the new animations here:
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/configuration/450258-npc-animations-graphics-when-found.html
Enjoy.

Read full topic

item.title: Matrix 718/742 Help
item.dc:creator: @JavaLearner JavaLearner
item.description:
@JavaLearner wrote:

Sorry, I’m not into 718/742.

Read full topic

item.title: Matrix 718/742 Help
item.dc:creator: @codyth codyth
item.description:
@codyth wrote:

@ JavaLearner Do you know what file I’d be able to change the anim’s in? Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Matrix 718/742 Help
item.dc:creator: @kingmen139 kingmen139
item.description:
@kingmen139 wrote:

CAn u please pm me the source, Client and cache? Ty so much

Read full topic

item.title: Matrix 718/742 Help
item.dc:creator: @JavaLearner JavaLearner
item.description:
@JavaLearner wrote:

Well, good luck finding the right animations for it. Change those and it should work fine.

Also, another way to check this is to transform you into Nex and perform the animation which is in your java file. If that works out well, it’s something else that’s wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Matrix 718/742 Help
item.dc:creator: @codyth codyth
item.description:
@codyth wrote:

It’s only strange when Nex Attacks/ Summons minions, she walks fine

Read full topic

item.title: Matrix 718/742 Help
item.dc:creator: @JavaLearner JavaLearner
item.description:
@JavaLearner wrote:

Not sure, maybe if someone gave other numbers to the animations, then yes.

Quick question, it does strange when it walks/attacks, right? Or only if it attacks or walks?

Read full topic

item.title: Matrix 718/742 Help
item.dc:creator: @codyth codyth
item.description:
@codyth wrote:

I’m not sure, are there new animation ID’s that I’d have to assign because of the new cache?

Read full topic

item.title: Matrix 718/742 Help
item.dc:creator: @JavaLearner JavaLearner
item.description:
@JavaLearner wrote:

Do you have the right animations set for the NPC’s? Also, changing those minions is just a matter of changing co-ordinates.

Read full topic
